body_html:
Also to clarify, you mention that this implementation sets a variable to request a stop, and then other workers check that variable. I can see where the PR sets a variable called STOP.

Where is the logic for other variables to check that the STOP variable is set? Is that being separately merged?

body:
Also to clarify, you mention that this implementation sets a variable to request a stop, and then other workers check that variable. I can see where the PR sets a variable called STOP. 

Where is the logic for other variables to check that the STOP variable is set? Is that being separately merged?
